The dress features heavy quality fabric and weighs absolutely nothing, making it worth the price. Regarding sizing, while some it fits great, others report it being 6-8 inches too long and 1-2 sizes too big. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 1000/10
items.body: Went out on a limb when I bought this dress. I think it only had one review at the time but Iâ€™m so glad I did. So worth it for the price! The dress is gorgeous and Fit true to size. Iâ€™m so happy with it! Read more
items.author: Chanda Taylor

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!!
items.body: Absolutely beautiful and very well made! My only concern is that there isnâ€™t a zipper, and only the corset back. I was able to install hook and eyes though so an easy fix ðŸ’› I would 100% recommend. The seller was also very responsive and helpful with my custom measurements!! Read more
items.author: Sharalyn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars IN LOVE
items.body: This dress is stunning! Weighs absolutely nothing. Itâ€™s so comfortable & not itchy at all. I saw other brides upload their pictures which fully convinced me to buy it. It was my first bridal dress ordered from Amazon. Im so thankful, the moment I tried it on I just knew it was the one. I am 4â€™11 so I got it hemmed a few inches from the bottom, plus I didnâ€™t want it full floor length. I also added straps for support since I have a bigger bust. Sizing was pretty easy, I measured myself, compared it to the sellerâ€™s sizing chart, and I sized down one size since itâ€™s corset back. We steamed it at home no problem. I think I purchased this dress around 90$ in April 2024. SO AFFORDABLE. To this day, I still receive so many compliments on my dress from our summer wedding. Itâ€™s a timeless, classic look. GET IT! Read more
items.author: Vargas

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow find!
items.body: I was shocked at the quality for the price. Found on another website for $700- $800! Same dress! Fits great, is beautiful! Read more
items.author: Katlady

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Order down a size!
items.body: Dress is beautiful. I went by the size chart and shouldn't have. It's at least 1-2 sizes too big. It's also a mile long but I'm 5ft tall so that's expected. I'm going to take it to the alterations place to see if they can bring it in enough to allow me to keep it and wear it but I may have to send it back and b/c the event is happening sooner than later, I won't have enough time to reorder. Read more
items.author: Mrs. Baker

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than Expected!
items.body: I got this dress in black as a second dress for my Halloween wedding reception. It is much better than expected given the cost. The sleeves do look slightly different, but I love them. It has a high-end boutique look for a fraction of the cost. Add some accessories to glam it up a bit, and you're golden. Read more
items.author: Alysha L Monfette

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress is stunning
items.body: This dress surpassed my expectations like above and beyond anything I couldâ€™ve imagined. Im super picky and thats why I couldnâ€™t find a dress in the 5 months of looking in all of the physical stores around me - so I went out on a limb and started looking online. After about 3 months of shopping around online, I decided on this dress. Iâ€™m so amazed at the quality of the material and the quality of the dress as a whole. You could literally wear it right out of the package - the seller did an amazing job folding and securing it while it was in transit. Its nice and heavy so it feels like a luxurious ball gown. I will be buying all of my gowns from this seller, from now on. Iâ€™m 5â€™2 and 125lbs and the dress I got was perfect in the body but was about 6-8â€ too long (which isnâ€™t surprising because Iâ€™m short) Read more
items.author: Amanda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great size and color
items.body: Loved this dress. It was true to color Read more
items.author: Kelsey

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Desert Rose, Black, Champagne, Dusty Blue, Orange, Rose Red, Lavender, Royal Blue, Turquoise, Grey, Sky Blue, Gold, Sage Green, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
